00032 struct AudioFormat
00033 {
00034         DWORD samplerate;
00035         WORD channels, bits;
00036 
00037         AudioFormat() {}
00038         AudioFormat(DWORD samplerate, WORD channels, WORD bits)
00039         {
00040                 this->samplerate = samplerate;
00041                 this->channels = channels;
00042                 this->bits = bits;
00043         }
00044         WAVEFORMATEX* GetWaveFormat(WAVEFORMATEX* result) const
00045         {
00046                 result->cbSize = 0;
00047                 result->wFormatTag = WAVE_FORMAT_PCM;
00048                 result->nChannels = channels;
00049                 result->nSamplesPerSec = samplerate;
00050                 result->wBitsPerSample = bits;
00051                 result->nBlockAlign = result->nChannels * result->wBitsPerSample / 8;
00052                 result->nAvgBytesPerSec = result->nSamplesPerSec * result->nBlockAlign;
00053 
00054                 return result;
00055         }
00056 };
